Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.name: EasyNSURLConnectionJsonType
Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.abstract: This option will set the body type of a JSON request to application/json.

Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.name: EasyNSURLConnectionvndapiJsonType
Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.abstract: This option will set the body type of a JSON request to application/vnd.api+json. Some web APIs might require this.

Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.name: JsonType
Type Definitions/EasyNSURLConnectionJson.abstract: This defines the body types of a JSON request.

Enums/JsonType.html#/c:@E@JsonType@EasyN.name: EasyNSURLConnectionJsonType
Enums/JsonType.html#/c:@E@JsonType@EasyN.abstract: This option will set the body type of a JSON request to application/json.

Enums/JsonType.html#/c:@E@JsonType@EasyN.name: EasyNSURLConnectionvndapiJsonType
Enums/JsonType.html#/c:@E@JsonType@EasyN.abstract: This option will set the body type of a JSON request to application/vnd.api+json. Some web APIs might require this.

Enums/JsonType.html.name: JsonType
Enums/JsonType.html.abstract: This defines the body types of a JSON request.

Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPostMethod.name: EasyNSURLPostMethod
Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPostMethod.abstract: This constant is used to set the request method to POST

Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLHeadMethod.name: EasyNSURLHeadMethod
Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLHeadMethod.abstract: This constant is used to set the request method to HEAD

Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPutMethod.name: EasyNSURLPutMethod
Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPutMethod.abstract: This constant is used to set the request method to PUT

Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPatchMethod.name: EasyNSURLPatchMethod
Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLPatchMethod.abstract: This constant is used to set the request method to PATCH

Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLDeleteMethod.name: EasyNSURLDeleteMethod
Constants.html#/c:@EasyNSURLDeleteMethod.abstract: This constant is used to set the request method to DELETE

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.name: error
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Contains any errors when executing the request.

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.name: -initWithData:withResponse:withError:
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Initalizes aa request object. Not to be called by the user.

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.name: -getResponseDataString
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Retruns the data from a response as a string.

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.name: -getResponseDataJsonParsed
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Convenience method to return a JSON response data as an NSArray or NSDictionary.

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.name: -getStatusCode
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the status code of a request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: useragent
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The user agent of the request. Example: MAL Updater OS X 2.2.13 (Macintosh; Mac OS X 10.12.3; en_US)

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: postmethod
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The post method of a request. (e.g. POST)

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: headers
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The request’s headers.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: formdata
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The request’s form data.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: response
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The request’s response

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: error
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Contains any errors when executing the request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: URL
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: The URL of the request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: usecookies
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: States whether or not a request should use cookies or not.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: usejson
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: This property will make EasyURLConnection to send JSON data opposed to URL Encoded

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: jsontype
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: This property sets the JSON type if usejson propertty is true or YES

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -init
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Initalizes a EasyNSURLConnection instance.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithURL:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Initalizes a EasyNSURLConnection instance with a URL.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -getResponseDataString
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Retruns the data from a response as a string.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -getResponseDataJsonParsed
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Convenience method to return a JSON response data as an NSArray or NSDictionary.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -getStatusCode
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the status code of a request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -addHeader:forKey:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Allows you to add a HTTP header to a request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -addFormData:forKey:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Allows you to add a parameter containing data.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -startRequest
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Starts a GET synchronous request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -startFormRequest
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Starts a Form synchronous request. If aa post method is not specified, it will default to POST.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -startJSONRequest:type:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Starts a JSON synchronous request with any JSON input. If aa post method is not specified, it will default to POST.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -startJSONFormRequest:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Starts a JSON synchronous request with any JSON input. If aa post method is not specified, it will default to POST.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -GET:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous GET request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -HEAD:parameters:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous HEAD request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -PATCH:parameters:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous PATCH request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -POST:parameters:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous POST request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -PUT:parameters:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous PUT request.

Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.name: -DELETE:parameters:headers:completion:error:
Classes/EasyNSURLConnection.html#/c:objc.abstract: Performs a asynchronous DELETE request.

Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html.name: EasyNSURLResponse
Classes/EasyNSURLResponse.html.abstract: This class specifies the response object when a request is done.
